verses.verse: I <S%G3785>wish<s%> that you would <S%G430>bear<s%> with me in a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G877>foolishness;<s%> but <S%G2532>indeed<s%> you are <S%G430>bearing<s%> with me.

For I <S%G2206>am<s%> <S%G2206>jealous<s%> for you with a <S%G2316>godly<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy;<s%> for I <S%G718>betrothed<s%> you to <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G435>husband,<s%> that to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> I might <S%G3936>present<s%> you [as] a <S%G53>pure<s%> <S%G3933>virgin.<s%>

But I <S%G5399>am<s%> <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> as the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G1818>deceived<s%> <S%G2096>Eve<s%> by his <S%G3834>craftiness,<s%> your <S%G3540>minds<s%> should be <S%G5351>led<s%> <S%G5351>astray<s%> from the <S%G572>simplicity<s%> and <S%G54>purity<s%> [of devotion] to <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For I <S%G3049>consider<s%> myself not in the <S%G3367>least<s%> <S%G5302>inferior<s%> to the <S%G5244>most<s%> <S%G5244>eminent<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

<S%G2228>Or<s%> did I <S%G4160>commit<s%> a <S%G266>sin<s%> in <S%G5013>humbling<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> that you might be <S%G5312>exalted,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to you <S%G1431>without<s%> <S%G1431>charge<s%>?

and when I was <S%G3918>present<s%> with you and was in <S%G5302>need,<s%> I was not a <S%G2655>burden<s%> to <S%G3762>anyone;<s%> for when the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> from <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> they <S%G4322>fully<s%> <S%G4322>supplied<s%> my <S%G5303>need,<s%> and in <S%G3956>everything<s%> I <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> from being a burden to you, and will <S%G4>continue<s%> to do so.

As the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is in me, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2746>boasting<s%> of <S%G1519>mine<s%> <S%G1473><s%> will not be <S%G5420>stopped<s%> in the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia.<s%>

But <S%G3739>what<s%> I am <S%G4160>doing,<s%> I will <S%G2532>continue<s%> to <S%G4160>do,<s%> that I may <S%G1581>cut<s%> <S%G1581>off<s%> <S%G874>opportunity<s%> from <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2309>desire<s%> an <S%G874>opportunity<s%> to be <S%G2147>regarded<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as we are in the matter about <S%G3739>which<s%> they are <S%G2744>boasting.<s%>

And <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2295>wonder,<s%> for <S%G846>even<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G3345>disguises<s%> himself as an <S%G32>angel<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> it is not <S%G3173>surprising<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> his <S%G1249>servants<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3345>disguise<s%> themselves as <S%G1249>servants<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness;<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> shall be <S%G2596>according<s%> to their <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

That <S%G3739>which<s%> I am <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> I am not <S%G2980>speaking<s%> as the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> would, but as in <S%G877>foolishness,<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5287>confidence<s%> of <S%G2746>boasting.<s%>

For you, <S%G1510>being<s%> [so] <S%G5429>wise,<s%> <S%G430>bear<s%> with the <S%G878>foolish<s%> <S%G2234>gladly.<s%>

For you <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2615>enslaves<s%> you, <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2719>devours<s%> you, <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2983>takes<s%> advantage of you, <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G1869>exalts<s%> himself, <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G1194>hits<s%> you in the <S%G4383>face.<s%>

To [my] <S%G819>shame<s%> I [must] <S%G3004>say<s%> that we have been <S%G770>weak<s%> [by comparison.] But in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> respect <S%G5100>anyone<s%> [else] is <S%G5111>bold<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> in <S%G877>foolishness<s%>), I <S%G5111>am<s%> <S%G2532>just<s%> as <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G1473>myself.<s%>

Are they <S%G1249>servants<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? (I <S%G2980>speak<s%> as if <S%G3912>insane<s%>) I <S%G5228>more<s%> <S%G5228>so;<s%> in <S%G4057>far<s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> <S%G2873>labors,<s%> in <S%G4057>far<s%> <S%G4057>more<s%> <S%G5438>imprisonments,<s%> <S%G4127>beaten<s%> <S%G5234>times<s%> <S%G5234>without<s%> <S%G5234>number,<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> in <S%G2288>danger<s%> of <S%G2288>death.<s%>
<S%G3999>Five<s%> <S%G3999>times<s%> I <S%G2983>received<s%> from the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> thirty-nine [lashes.]

<S%G5151>Three<s%> <S%G5151>times<s%> I was <S%G4463>beaten<s%> with <S%G4463>rods,<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> I was <S%G3034>stoned,<s%> <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times<s%> I was <S%G3489>shipwrecked,<s%> a <S%G3574>night<s%> and a <S%G3574>day<s%> I have <S%G4160>spent<s%> in the <S%G1037>deep.<s%>

[I have been] on <S%G4178>frequent<s%> <S%G3597>journeys,<s%> in <S%G2794>dangers<s%> from <S%G4215>rivers,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> from <S%G3027>robbers,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> from [my] <S%G1085>countrymen,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> from the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> in the <S%G2047>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2794>dangers<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5569>false<s%> <S%G5569>brethren;<s%>

[I have been] in <S%G2873>labor<s%> and <S%G3449>hardship,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4178>many<s%> <S%G70>sleepless<s%> <S%G70>nights,<s%> in <S%G3042>hunger<s%> and <S%G1373>thirst,<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G3521>without<s%> <S%G3521>food,<s%> in <S%G5592>cold<s%> and <S%G1132>exposure.<s%>

<S%G5565>Apart<s%> from [such] <S%G3924>external<s%> things, there is the <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G7081>pressure<s%> upon me [of] <S%G3308>concern<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1577>churches.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G2532>without<s%> <S%G3756><s%> my being <S%G770>weak<s%>? <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G4624>led<s%> into <S%G4624>sin<s%> <S%G2532>without<s%> <S%G3756><s%> my <S%G4448>intense<s%> <S%G4448>concern<s%>?
<S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G1163>have<s%> to <S%G2744>boast,<s%> I will <S%G2744>boast<s%> of <S%G769>what<s%> pertains to my <S%G769>weakness.<s%>
The <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3962>Father<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> He who is <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G165>forever,<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> that I am not <S%G5574>lying.<s%>

In <S%G1154>Damascus<s%> the <S%G1481>ethnarch<s%> under <S%G702>Aretas<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G5432>guarding<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G1153>Damascenes<s%> in order to <S%G4084>seize<s%> me,
and I was <S%G5465>let<s%> <S%G5465>down<s%> in a <S%G4553>basket<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G2376>window<s%> in the <S%G5038>wall,<s%> and [so] <S%G1628>escaped<s%> his <S%G5495>hands.<s%>
